pages.text: By using alchemy to bind a soul checker with an ender chest, I have managed to fashion a device that exposes the inventory of the one who placed it as a container. I'm sure that I can come up with some creative uses for this.$(br2)It seems that each side exposes a different part of the inventory, each indicated by a symbol.
I should make sure I keep this device in a secure location, for if someone were to find it, there would be nothing stopping them from siphoning all of my belongings.
